item.title: Displays
item.description: Scope display, showing the waveform picked up by the microphone Spectrum display, showing the spectrum generated, which may be zoomed in to show the tuning of up to eight reeds. Data display showing the current note, cents error, frequency error, reference note frequency and actual measured frequency Strobe display, which may be hidden to remove distraction Staff display, which replaces the strobe display when hidden Meter display, showing the cents error
